author: VinInn
body:
clean Math from obsolete modifications
reestablish tests: make it working for AVX2 as well.
avoid major regression when using FMA avoiding fp contraction in
TrackingTools/TrackFitters (cure the symptoms not the cause!)

took the opportunity to (re-)inline heavily used constructors

negligible regressions expected (and observed) due to numerics (even when compiled for avx2 fma targets)
title: small fix/improve toward a usable AVX2 build
